string.value: You meet Shiba at The Secret Garden who tells you about the reasons he became a Dual Blade. After finishing his story, Shiba tells you to go see #bYun#k to hear the rest of the story.

You met Shiba at The Secret Garden who told you about the reasons he became a Dual Blade. After he finished his story, Shiba told you to go see #bYun#k to hear the rest of the story. You went up to the next level using the stairs and met #bYun#k, who was standing on top of an owl.
Well, that's enough from me. You can hear the rest from Yun. #bYun#k should be upstairs. You should go make your way to see her now.
Hello #b#h0##k, my name is Yun. I've heard a lot about you from Brother Ryden. I assume that you've already met Brother Shiba?

In that case, there really isn't much more for me to tell you. If you'll allow me, I would like to make a request on behalf of Sister Syl.\r\nYou should already know this, but Sister Syl is the daughter of the former Dark Lord. During the days of the former Dark Lord's reign, Sister Syl and Jin spent many joyous days together. After all, Jin was the most prized disciple of the former Dark Lord.
One day, the former Dark Lord disappeared without leaving any last word or instruction. Lady Syl waited anxiously until Jin finally left to search for the Dark Lord.

Not long after, Jin returned. He returned with the Dark Lord's personal items, along with news that he had passed away. The people then appointed Jin to be the next Dark Lord, but Lady Syl didn't understand what was happening. It all seemed too contrived...

Then one day, a traveler delivered shocking news to Lady Syl. He said that Jin had murdered the former Dark Lord. From then on, Lady Syl vowed revenge. She swore to oust Jin from his position as the Dark Lord and to unveil the truth to the public.
Well, that's enough from me. You can hear the rest from Yun. #bYun#k should be upstairs. You should go make your way to see her now.
